title: Emperor - In The Nightside Eclipse (20th Anniversary Edition) [M
description:
Emperor - In The Nightside Eclipse (20th Anniversary Edition) [Metal] (2014) (mp3)

Emperor is a Norwegian black metal band formed in 1991, regarded as highly influential by critics and emerging black metal bands. They dissolved in 2001, but reunited from 2005 to 2007 for a few festival dates and brief US tours, and will once again be reuniting in 2014. The group was founded by Ihsahn (guitar/vocals) and Samoth (then, drums).

In the Nightside Eclipse is the first studio album and fourth official release by Norwegian black metal band Emperor, released in 1994 through Candlelight Records. It was the last album to feature drummer Faust and the only one to feature one-time bassist Tchort. Considered a landmark in the black metal scene, the album has been ranked by critics as one of the most influential albums of the genre. It also contains one of Emperor's best known tracks, "I Am the Black Wizards".

Year: 2014
Country: Norway
Genre: Black Metal
Codec: Mp3
Bitrate: 320kbps
